```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(leaflet)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(dplyr)
library(sf)
library(shiny)

# Color palette
pal <- colorNumeric("YlOrRd", domain = NULL)

# Load African country boundaries
africa <- ne_countries(continent = "Africa", returnclass = "sf")
```



### African Countries 
```{r}
# Plot 
leaflet(africa) |>
  addTiles() |>
  addPolygons()
```
